name: Aero Club Milano
about: Aero Club Milano, located at Milano-Bresso Airport, is Italy's oldest and most prestigious aero club. Established with a rich history of producing skilled aviators, the club offers premier flight training through modular programs. Students benefit from comprehensive instruction, utilizing the facilities at Aeroporto Di Milano Bresso. With a commitment to excellence, Aero Club Milano provides a supportive and professional environment for aspiring pilots to achieve their aviation goals. For more information, visit our website at www.aeroclubmilano.it.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
